title: Full Stack Software Developer
pitch: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.
about: Software Developer, coming from an Electrical technology background with a first-class honor degree; I m familiar with the sort of fast-paced, intense environment found in a lot of Software industries, problem-solving skills, effective communication, and more I now use every day as a developer and professional. with a love for clean code and accessible design. I am addicted to programming and remote work and capable of ramping up quickly and efficiently.
contactCta: If you have an application you are intersted in developing, a feature that you need built or a project that needs coding. I'd love to help with it.
name: Name
expDescription6: Rebrand the whole application platform into a new design. Collaborate closely with designers to implement UI/UX designs, ensuring consistency and responsiveness across all platforms
expDescription1: Develop and maintain scalable frontend for the company's web platform. Collaborate closely with designers to implement UI/UX designs, ensuring consistency and responsiveness across all platforms. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code, adhering to best practices and coding standards. Work closely with cross-functional teams to define technical requirements and prioritize feature development based on business objectives.
expDescription2: Re-write the company's old legacy code into a new and up-to-date format to improve users’ experiences. Develop and maintain scalable frontend and backend solutions for the company's female health technology platform. Collaborate closely with designers to implement UI/UX designs, ensuring consistency and responsiveness across all platforms. Fixing bugs and enhancing the users’ experience on the platform
expDescription3: Work alongside the Engineering team to develop software for digital health and AI adoption.
expDescription4: Ensuring the quality of source code and conducting code and UI reviews. Proposed improvements to code organization to improve code quality
expDescription5: Mentored junior web developers, providing technical support through code reviews. Provided advice and tips on how to maintain motivation and longevity in the program
